Location service manages couriers locations updates. It has three main responsibilities:
- It tells clients to send more location updates or stop (It uses delivery status events and geofencing to decide that).
- It publishes courier position updates into Kafka.
- It publishes courier status changes based on the location of the courier.
Service uses Kafka to consume & publish messages, has public endpoint for courier location and uses Redis (with Geospatial indexing).
